title: Amish Sweet Bread Recipe
directions: In a large bowl, dissolve the sugar in warm water (110° F) and then stir in yeast.
Allow to proof until yeast resembles a creamy foam about 10 minutes.
Mix salt and oil into the yeast.
Mix in flour one cup at a time.
Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth. If using a Kitchen Aid or other mixer, let mix/knead for about 5 minutes.
Place in a well-oiled bowl and coverwith a damp cloth.
Allow to rise until doubled in bulk, about 1 hour.
After it has risen, punch dough down and knead for about 1 minute. Divide in half and shape loaves. Place into 2 well-oiled 9x5 inch loaf pans. Allow to rise for about 30 minutes.
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes or until cooked through and top is brown. Immediately place on cooling rack to cool.
ingredients: 3 cups flour bread flour, if possible
